Everyone:

I am looking for opinions on the pro side of using inner classes=
 to test the private parts of a class. Since I don't use the technique myse=
lf, I don't know whether there is any advantage to this technique, other th=
an it works. (I could also use JUnitX without cluttering up my source code.=
)

I am interested in hearing from those of you who employ the technique an=
d have found some real benefit to it over using JUnitX to achieve the same =
goal.

Thanks.
